title: D-Link Modem
body: Why is it so god damn bad

replies.body:
Dlink modems are decent, not the best but certainly not the worst. Cough Belkin Cough


I suspect its the provider it connects to.
Telstra + dlink probs the worst combo ever made
telstra is the best in aus.
Telstra was "ok" in the area I live with the iinet modem, but this is just unbearable now.
You've given no specifics and thus no answer can be given. {{champion:26}}
